name: AMAZE (itch) (jar33)
description:
This game is about being able to successfully find the exit wall in different maze settings.  It is meant to be a little challenging and can get tricky. 

Player discretion: The screen may flash and there might be some jump scares as the game moves to further levels.

A fun time passing game - Me.

This is my very first game, so I am still learning! Thank you in advance and Enjoy!
